title: Software Installation Issues
description: Fix problems installing or uninstalling software programs.

steps.title: Run Installer as Administrator
steps.instruction: Right-click the installer file → Select 'Run as administrator'. This resolves most permission-related installation errors.

steps.title: Disable Antivirus Temporarily
steps.instruction: Temporarily disable your antivirus software during installation. Some security software blocks installers. Re-enable after installation.

steps.title: Check System Requirements
steps.instruction: Verify your computer meets minimum requirements (RAM, disk space, OS version) for the software you're installing.

steps.title: Clean Up Temp Files
steps.instruction: Press Win+R → type %temp% → Delete all files in the folder. Then run Disk Cleanup to free space for installation.

steps.title: Use Windows Troubleshooter
steps.instruction: Settings → Update & Security → Troubleshoot → Additional troubleshooters → Program Compatibility Troubleshooter → Run.
